data.message: Ur truelly the best...better than all the rest!!😊😘u for sure get me threw w every song u do and not just that just u being you for sure you are true to any game all others cant compare just so lame since u rose to fame...by the way love all your names!!😘💝would not be the same without our man...life wld be so much pain!!! We love u Eminem no matter where u are u will forever be our Star🌟!!!and for that i can speak for all when i say...we thank you Eminem,Slim Shady, B Rabbit, last but never least Marshall Mathers 111📧😘💿📝🎵🎧 and so much more😌!!!
